abstract: Intel might do well to be alarmed by the computer chips being designed by Qualcomm, a maker of chips for cellphones.
snippet: Intel might do well to be alarmed by the computer chips being designed by Qualcomm, a maker of chips for cellphones.
lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO  From mainframes to minicomputers and then PCs, each new computing generation has displaced its predecessor by reaching a broader audience and costing far less. And each time, the dominant company in one generation loses control in the next.

headline.main: Intel’s Dominance Is Challenged by a Low-Power Upstart
headline.print_headline: Intel’s Dominance Is Challenged by a Low-Power Upstart
